subject: Basketball
United States Armament and Defense
lead_paragraph: Neal Hawks, a Dallas Mavericks season-ticket holder, gave his 10 courtside seats for Saturday night’s game to Army soldiers who had returned from Iraq and Afghanistan with serious injuries.
snippet: Neal Hawks, a Dallas Mavericks season-ticket holder, gave his 10 courtside seats for Saturday night’s game to Army soldiers who had returned from Iraq and Afghanistan with serious injuries.
